tool_description: Generates regulatory and audit reports for order executions, including transaction cost analysis and best execution compliance reporting.

report_type.description: Type of report: transaction_cost_analysis, best_execution, audit_trail, regulatory_filing

symbols.description: List of symbols to include in report (empty for all)

venues.description: List of venues to include in report (empty for all)

include_cancelled_orders.description: Whether to include cancelled orders in the report

aggregation_level.description: Report aggregation: order, symbol, venue, daily

error_messages: Invalid report type: Report type must be one of [transaction_cost_analysis, best_execution, audit_trail, regulatory_filing].
Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and within last 2 years.
No data available: No execution data found for the specified criteria.
Invalid aggregation level: Aggregation level must be one of [order, symbol, venue, daily].
Report generation failed: Unable to generate report due to data processing error.
usage: Specify report type and date range. Optionally filter by symbols and venues, and configure aggregation level for desired report granularity.

report_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated report

total_orders.description: Total number of orders included in the report

total_volume.description: Total trading volume covered by the report

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non_compliant, or under_review
